text: 4Mag Nitrous are an American southern metal band originating from Louisiana, formed in 2000. Their music has featured on TV shows Monster Garage and Dog the Bounty Hunter. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * 4Mag Nitrous (2005) * Southern Wisdom & Know-How (2009) ==References== Category:American sludge metal musical groups
title: 4Mag Nitrous
